message.content:
cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.MA, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses delegation, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The policies proposed in the paper are based on quitting games and multi-armed bandits, which are both topics in game theory (cs.GT). The empirical testing of the policies involves evaluating their effectiveness, which is a common theme in machine learning (cs.LG). The use of multi-armed bandits is also a common approach in reinforcement learning (cs.MA). Finally, the recursive nature of delegation and the need to choose who to delegate to can be seen as a social choice problem, which is a topic in social and information networks (cs.SI).
